data.quote: You life matters. You are here for a reason. Your job is to determine why.
data.author: Michael Hyatt

data.quote: You have been given a gift—your life. What will you do with it?
data.author: Michael Hyatt

data.quote: You are in a much better position to serve others when your basic needs are met and your “tank is full.
data.author: Michael Hyatt

data.quote: Courage is the willingness to act in spite of fear.
data.author: Michael Hyatt

data.quote: One of the best questions you can ask when something negative happens is this: What does this experience make possible?
data.author: Michael Hyatt

data.quote: Gratitude is where every positive attitude starts.
data.author: Michael Hyatt

data.quote: This is the day that everything can change for you.
data.author: Michael Hyatt

data.quote: We have more control than most of us realize. Each day is filled with thousands of opportunities to change the story of our lives.
data.author: Michael Hyatt

data.quote: By keeping the truly important things front and center, we often get the perspective we need to make better decisions.
data.author: Michael Hyatt

data.quote: Having clarity on where you want to go is one of the most critical components of your life.
data.author: Michael Hyatt

data.quote: Making appointments with yourself and scheduling other things around them is key to proactive self-management.
data.author: Michael Hyatt

data.quote: You will never see the full path. The important thing is to do the next right thing.
data.author: Michael Hyatt

data.quote: Self-leadership always precedes team leadership.
data.author: Michael Hyatt

data.quote: People at any stage will profit by taking the wheel and getting pointed in the right direction.
data.author: Michael Hyatt

data.quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you desing for the present.
data.author: Michael Hyatt

data.quote: You can’t get where you want to go unless you start with where you are.
data.author: Michael Hyatt

data.quote: So many of us have settled for what is, rather than what could be.
data.author: Michael Hyatt

data.quote: The deciding vote in your life is yours, not your circumstances.
data.author: Michael Hyatt

data.quote: Keeping your eye on the future is essential for making the most of today.
data.author: Michael Hyatt

data.quote: The law of diminishing intent says that the longer you delay doing something, the less probability you have of actually doing it.
data.author: Michael Hyatt
